about_the_game:
Who are those stylish chaps, you ask? Rear Echelon, my friend. With this exclusive pack of support troop themed items, you too can lead from the rear!

Provides a set of new items for the US forces.

  • Driver goggles
  • Black undershirt
  • Tunic, with armband, and whistle
  • Driver helmet with goggles
  • Military Police helmet
  • M17 gas mask

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.5GHz or AMD Phenom @ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: UNSUPPORTED HARDWARE: 32-bit Operating Systems
